    Authenticates a user against LDAP

      Use LDAP to authenticate the user

      • authenticate

        public ProxyEntity authenticate(Domain d,
                                java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.String org)
                         throws AuthenticationException
        this method authenticates without creating a gui popup window for the user. The username/password/org must be provided. this method assumes dc=ecoinformatics,dc=org.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException
